00002 /*Computes the Kronecker Product of two matrices and stores it as matrix C*/
00003 
00004 void kronecker(double **A ,double **B,double **C,int ma,int na,int mb,int nb)
00005 {
00006 
00007         int i,j,k,p;
00008     
00009 
00010         for( i=0; i<ma; i++)
00011                 for( j=0; j<na; j++)
00012                         for(k=0; k<mb; k++)
00013                                 for(p=0; p<nb; p++)
00014                                         C[k + i*mb][p + j*nb] = A[i][j]*B[k][p];
00015                                                              
00016 }
